about_the_game:
Shenaniguns is a top-down, real time multiplayer shooter. Each time you spawn, you get 2-3 weapons (depending on the gamemode) to battle your friends!

Featuring tons of weapons such as:

  • Pistols

  • Shotguns

  • Snipers

  • Grenades

  • Portal guns

  • Concentrated uranium

  • Gasoline

  • Absolutely not FNF

  • Gambling

  • Galvanized square steel

  • An enchantment table to make weapons even more powerful

  • The flag of the United States of America

And much, much more, including special abilities!

Gamemodes

  • FFA - Kill as many people as possible!

  • TDM - Two even teams, red and blue!

  • 3W - FFA, but with 3 weapons instead of 2!

  • Capture the flag - Capture the other team's flag for extra points!

  • Boss battles - Such as Vectah! More coming soon

  • CHAOS - Explode when you die, move faster, 3 weapons, closer spawning, bigger fires, bigger battles, and a whole lot of concentrated nuclear waste

  • DROP - 1 Weapon, but you drop it when you die

  • HEARTS - Free for all, but with health drops

What's in the demo?

  • 14 playable maps, including an abandoned mansion, a chessboard, an ice rink and the backrooms

  • 89+ weapons, with more to come

  • Controller support with Steam Input

  • Tutorial

  • Public multiplayer servers with all the above listed game-modes

What's not in the demo?

  • Private lobbies and matches

  • More than one boss-fight (at the moment, it's only Vectah)

  • Most cosmetics such as emotes, kill effects and skins

  • Most levelling & rewards

  • Unique music for all maps

Want to keep track of the game's development? Follow the store page, or join our Discord (link's on the right)
detailed_description:
Shenaniguns is a top-down, real time multiplayer shooter. Each time you spawn, you get 2-3 weapons (depending on the gamemode) to battle your friends!

Featuring tons of weapons such as:

  • Pistols

  • Absolutely not FNF

  • Gambling

  • An enchantment table to make weapons even more powerful

  • The flag of the United States of America

And much, much more, including special abilities!

Gamemodes

  • FFA - Kill as many people as possible!

  • TDM - Two even teams, red and blue!

  • 3W - FFA, but with 3 weapons instead of 2!

  • Capture the flag - Capture the other team's flag for extra points!

  • Boss battles - Such as Vectah! More coming soon

  • CHAOS - Explode when you die, move faster, 3 weapons, closer spawning, bigger fires, bigger battles, and a whole lot of concentrated nuclear waste

  • DROP - 1 Weapon, but you drop it when you die

  • HEARTS - Free for all, but with health drops

What's in the demo?

  • 14 playable maps, including an abandoned mansion, a chessboard, an ice rink and the backrooms

  • 89+ weapons, with more to come

  • Tutorial

What's not in the demo?

  • Private lobbies and matches

  • More than one boss-fight (at the moment, it's only Vectah)

  • Most cosmetics such as emotes, kill effects and skins

  • Most levelling & rewards

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz 64-Bit Quad Core – Intel/AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: 2-4 GHz 64-Bit Quad Core – Intel/AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Shenaniguns Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz 64-Bit Quad Core – Intel/AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe/GeForce GTX 1650 or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Being rendered with p5.js, the game is CPU intensive moreso than GPU intensive.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2-4 GHz 64-Bit Quad Core – Intel/AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A comical top-down real-time multiplayer shooter, with tons of unique weapons, guns and items in a randomizer.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
